meanings.definition: A man who is funny or amusing.
meanings.sent1: The funnyman made everyone laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent2: The audience loved the funnyman's stand-up comedy show.
meanings.sent3: The funnyman's witty remarks kept the crowd entertained.
meanings.sent4: He was the funnyman of the group, always bringing smiles to people's faces.
meanings.sent5: The funnyman's humor was contagious, spreading joy wherever he went.

meanings.sent1: The funnyman on stage had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent2: The funnyman's jokes were the highlight of the show.
meanings.sent3: The funnyman's performance was a barrel of laughs.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the funnyman of the comedy club.
meanings.sent5: The funnyman's comedic timing was impeccable, earning him roaring applause.
